name: Grillieren!
overview: Way back in 2006 a coder by the name of Widdy released a rather charming little game called Beer Belly Bill In : Grillieren! Barbecue Deluxe for the Gameboy Advanced, with later ports to the Wii, Android and even Java. But now in 2017 Widdy(Code/Graphics) and FieserWolf (Music) via Genesis Project, has released a preview of the C64 version, which according to a CSDb member by the name of Groepaz is about 10 years old!
